pullRequest.title: [PaxosStateLog] Use WAL and remove locking
pullRequest.bodyText:
Goals (and why):
Use WAL and higher timeout instead of our own locking
Implementation Description (bullets):
Pretty straightforward
Testing (What was existing testing like?  What have you done to improve it?):
Passes the more aggressive version of the concurrency test, and is much faster at it!
Concerns (what feedback would you like?):
Timeout of 5 seconds reasonable?
Where should we start reviewing?:
SqliteConnections.java
Priority (whenever / two weeks / yesterday):
Monday

nodes.bodyText: 💯 We end up avoiding having to do reflection!

commit.message: Reduce the load in the high concurrency test
